title: 1979 Mazda RX-7
item_description:
1979 Mazda RX-7

Specifications

  • Year: 1979
  • Make: Mazda
  • Model: RX-7
  • VIN: SA22C-562775
    • Registration Expiration: 7/16/2007
    • 09/02/93 SALVAGED
    • PNO-REGISTRATION DEFERRED
  • Odometer Reads: 5,317
  • Key: Available
  • Drive Type: Rear Wheel Drive
  • Engine: Rotary 9REP 35 Cu. In. X2
  • Body Style: Hatchback Coupe
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline 
  • Transmission: Five-speed manual 

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Blue and Red
  • Doors: Two Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Cloth
  • Interior Color: Gray

Note: Seller Conducted a lien sale (Certification of Lien Sale for Vehicle REG 168A) on November 8, 2021 but was not sold as no qualifying bid was received. The lienholder becomes the buyer. The lien sale paperwork and a new Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks after removal. This vehicle is being sold with lien sale paperwork, and is not registered with California DMV, Seller will not perform smog. The buyer agrees to repair if needed and smog the vehicle, an "as-is" no smog bill of sale must be signed by the Seller/Buyer. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of smog, registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV. Description updated 11/4/2024 at 12:32 pm.
